entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:34 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening. Rain along parts of the coast. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
